channel.title: Raspberry Pi on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on Joost Plattel

item.title: Building an ARM Terminal
item.description:
For long I’ve been inspired by future interfaces commonly seen in science fiction movies and other things like comics or concept art. I’ve been following the Cyberdeck reddit for some time and when I came accross the ARM Terminal by Back7 I knew I had to build one..

Fast forward a few months and one 3D printer later, I’ve managed to print most of the parts (For smaller printers like the Prusa Mini I have it’s better to split the bigger parts and glue them together later with superglue). After the shipment of parts & screen came in, I started the assembly and it currently looks like this:
